News.Description: Caltrans construction activity is ongoing for the US-101 Broadway Interchange Project in Burlingame.  Work involves constructing a new seven-lane overpass to replace the existing four-lane Broadway overpass.  Broadway will be realigned and extended across US-101 from the Broadway/Rollins Rd intersection to the Old Bayshore Hwy/Airport Blvd intersection. Motorists should expect delays, and various road, lane and ramp closures during all construction activity on both northbound and southbound US-101, weather permitting. Detours will be in place through construction zones. This project is scheduled to be completed by mid- 2017.  <a href="http://www.dot.ca.gov/dist4/projects/broadwayrecon/index.htm"><strong>Click here</a></strong> for project details
News.Title: US-101 Broadway Interchange Project in Burlingame

News.Description: The VTA/BART Silicon Valley Project is a 16-mile extension of the existing BART system to San Jose, Milpitas, and Santa Clara. Hostetter Road, Montague Expressway, and Capitol Avenue are subject to traffic shifts, intermittent lane closures, and detours during construction. This project is scheduled for completion  in 2018.  <a href="http://www.vta.org/bart/construction"><strong>Click here</a></strong> for more information.
News.Title: VTA  /  BART Silicon Valley Berryessa Extension Project

News.Description: Calaveras Road is closed to all  traffic, between Geary Rd and Oakridge Road, near the Alameda/Santa Clara County line due to storm damage. The road will remain closed until further notice. For more details, <a href="https://sfwater.org/index.aspx?page=979"><strong>click here</a></strong>.
News.Title: Calaveras Road Closure in Rural Alameda County
I-680 Express Lane Project Between Walnut Creek and San Ramon

News.Description: Caltrans has closed the 29th Avenue Overcrossing  at I-880 in Oakland/Alameda due to a reconstruction project between Ford and 10th Streets in Oakland.  Construction activity may result in lane, ramp and full overnight freeway closures of north- and southbound I-880, weather permitting.  Detours will be available between Oakland and Alameda.  Motorists are advised to expect delays and to use alternate routes during these closures.  This project is scheduled to be completed by early 2017.  <a href="http://www.dot.ca.gov/dist4/projects/88023rd29thovercrossing/"><strong>Click here</a></strong> for more information.
News.Title: 29th Avenue Overcrossing in Oakland Closed from April 2015 to Early 2017

News.Description: As of November 2016, Caltrans began a project to replace overhead signs in multiple locations along CA-17, CA-85, US-101, CA-237, I-280, I-680 and I-880 in Santa Clara County. There will be overnight full freeway and various ramp closures between the hours of 11:00pm and 5:00am. Detours will be available and all work is weather permitting. This project is scheduled to be completed in summer 2017.
News.Title: Caltrans - Full Overnight Closures of Select Freeways in Santa Clara County to Replace Overhead Signage

News.Description: Get current road conditions on any California highway by <a href="http://www.dot.ca.gov/cgi-bin/roads.cgi"><b>clicking here</a></b>, or call 511 and say traffic, then Tahoe and statewide road conditions.</a>
News.Title: Get Current Road Conditions to Reno/Lake Tahoe and Outside the Bay Area from Caltrans

News.Description: VTA's Montague Light Rail Station Closure in Milpitas has been postponed until further notice.  The plan is to temporarily close the station for three months for construction modifications.  Please check back for updates.
News.Title: VTA Montague Station Temporary Three-Month Closure Postponed Until Further Notice

News.Description: Due to an additional third lane being constructed from the Sir Francis Drake Blvd. on-ramp in Marin to the Marine St. exit in Contra Costa County, motorists are advised to expect overnight lane reductions and on and off-ramp closures.  The existing bicycle access on westbound I-580 between Marine St. and Stenmark Dr. in Richmond will no longer be available.  In lieu of freeway access, a free shuttle with bike racks will be available from 7am to 7pm.  Motorists are advised to expect delays and detours during the closure.  For further information on this closure <a href=" http://mtc.ca.gov/our-work/plans-projects/major-regional-projects/richmond-san-rafael-bridge-access-improvements"><strong>Click Here .</strong></a>
News.Title: Richmond-San Rafael Bridge Construction Work Until Spring of 2018

News.Description: Caltrans reports that there is an emergency road closure in place due to a landslide on CA-84 between Skyline Blvd and Grand View Rd in Woodside. One way traffic control is in effect. Roadway is accesible to local residents only. Caltrans plans to reopen the roadway by Monday, July 31st at midnight. Expect delays.
News.Title: Landslide on CA-84 Between Skyline Blvd and Grand View Rd in Woodside. One Way Traffic Control in Effect.

News.Description: On Monday, April 3rd, Caltrans reports that there is an emergency road closure in place due to a landslide on CA-35 (Skyline Blvd) between CA-9 and Black Rd in Santa Clara County. All lanes remain closed in both directions. Caltrans plans to reopen the roadway by Saturday, September 30th at 6:00 pm. Consider using alternate routes.
News.Title: Landslide on CA-35 (Skyline Blvd) Between CA-9 and Black Rd in Santa Clara County, All Lanes Closed in Both Directions

News.Description: Beginning Monday, March 6, Caltrans will close westbound Vallecitos Road from CA-84 in Livermore to all vehicular traffic to construct retaining walls and drainage systems. The closure will be in place for two months and work is weather permitting. Detours will be available. Motorists are advised to expect delays during this closure.
News.Title: Caltrans - Westbound Vallecitos Road in Livermore Closed for Two Months

News.Description: BART plans to close the tracks between Fruitvale and Lake Merritt Stations to perform vital repairs on select weekends between April and July.  The first of these closures is planned to occur on the weekend of April 8th - 9th.  During the closures there will be no train service between Fruitvale and Lake Merritt, and the Lake Merritt Station will be closed.  A free bus bridge will operate between Fruitvale and 19th St. Stations in Oakland to shuttle riders around the closure. Riders on the Fremont, Dublin and Oakland Airport lines will be impacted.  The buses may add 20 to 40 minutes to your trip. <a href="http://www.bart.gov/news/articles/2017/news20170302-1"><strong>Click here</a></strong> for track closure dates and times, as well as more information on the bus bridge.
News.Title: Weekend BART Track Closures Between Fruitvale and Lake Merritt Stations, April-July

News.Description: Caltrans will close various on and off-ramps along east and westbound I-580,  between Oakland and Emeryville, due to a resurfacing project.  Closures will also take place on the westbound CA-24 connector-ramp to westbound I-580 in Oakland.  Roadwork begins at 10:00pm and ends the following morning at 6:30am.  These closures will be ongoing (weather permitting)  until the fall of 2017.  Motorists are advised to expect delays and to follow detour routes during these closures.  For more information <a href="http://www.dot.ca.gov/d4/580ramps/docs/4h222_fact-sheet-02-13-17-public-meeting-rc.pdf"><strong>click here</strong></a>.
News.Title: Caltrans - Various Overnight Ramp Closures Along I-580 Between Oakland and Emeryville Until the Fall of 2017

News.Description: The Oakland Athletics (MLB) host the Los Angeles Angels at Oakland Coliseum for a four game series Monday, April 3rd through Thursday, April 6th. The games begin at 7:05pm. Game time on Thursday is 12:05pm.  Motorists can expect heavy traffic on I-880 as well as local streets adjacent to the stadium before and after the games.
News.Title: Oakland Athletics (MLB) Host the Los Angeles Angels at Oakland Coliseum

News.Description: On Monday, April 3rd between 7:00am and 2:00pm, the three left lanes approaching the Carquinez Bridge toll plaza on eastbound I-80 in Vallejo will be closed to perform emergency pavement repairs.  Motorists are advised to expect  major delays and to consider taking alternate routes to avoid the area during this closure.
News.Title: Carquinez Bridge Lane Closures on Eastbound I-80 in Vallejo

News.Description: From Monday, April 3rd to Friday, April 7th the SF Muni bus stops for lines 2 and 3 at Post and Van Ness Streets will be closed due to construction. The closures will be in effect between the hours of 9:00 am and 3:00 pm. Passengers for either line should board at Post and Gough Streets or Post and Polk Streets.
News.Title: SF Muni Bus Stops for Lines 2 and 3 Closed Due to Construction, 4/3 - 4/7
